name: Doodles' Totally Pre-Planned Picnic
description: It’s Doodles’ and Pumpkin’s wedding anniversary, but doodles forgot all about it! Help Doodles cobble together a romantic picnic by foraging for delicious squirrel food in the woods. It’s not going to be easy, edible plants could be hiding pretty much anywhere. And berries might not be the only thing you’ll find in the bushes… Use WASD to move Walk over items to pick them up Watch out for the wolf. Good luck!
